You must use Killer Bee on the mission Taka Invades, the one wherein sasuke is the executor (1st topmost mission) 4 years ago 0 0 Rayearthe answered: Last Chapter's "A Miscalculation" Use Suigetsu's Map Card above it and it will get you "Karin" which tells who will you choose in opening gates. For Suigetsu's Map Card Finish Uchiha Bonds and Finish Itachi's Fight and it will get you his Map Card. Hope it helps... 4 years ago 1 0 MHMSB answered: Answers Use Gaara on the mission Road to the Northern Hideout (Chapter 4, 4th battle) Use Shikamaru on the mission Chasing the "Akatsuki (Chapter 5, 1st battle) Use Itachi on the mission Infiltrating the Hidden Cloud (Chapter
